groups.name: com.www.common.request
groups.description: 请求响应报文AOP拦截自动配置类.

groups.name: com.www.common.oauth2
groups.description: oauth2资源服务配置自动配置类.

properties.name: com.www.common.request.enable
properties.description: 是否开启请求响应报文AOP拦截

properties.name: com.www.common.request.content
properties.description: 请求响应字段过长替换的字符串

properties.name: com.www.common.request.replace
properties.description: 请求响应字段过长时是否开启字符串替换

properties.name: com.www.common.request.length
properties.description: 请求响应字段过长时字符串长度限制

properties.name: com.www.common.code.read-enable
properties.description: 是否开启数据字典读取

properties.name: com.www.common.code.read-scheduled
properties.description: 定时重新读取字典的时间格式

properties.name: com.www.common.code.write-enable
properties.description: 是否开启数据字典写入redis

properties.name: com.www.common.code.write-scheduled
properties.description: 定时重新写入redis数据字典的时间格式

properties.name: com.www.common.code.code-redis-lock
properties.description: 数据字典的分布式锁key，不为空则使用分布式锁将数据字典写入redis

properties.name: com.www.common.code.code-redis-key
properties.description: redis中数据字典的key

properties.name: com.www.common.datasource.enable
properties.description: 是否开启多数据源配置

properties.name: com.www.common.datasource.monitor
properties.description: 是否开启druid监控平台

properties.name: com.www.common.datasource.monitor-name
properties.description: druid监控平台用户

properties.name: com.www.common.datasource.monitor-pwd
properties.description: druid监控平台密码

properties.name: com.www.common.file.enable
properties.description: 是否开启文件上传

properties.name: com.www.common.file.img-url-path
properties.description: 图片访问路径

properties.name: com.www.common.file.img-save-path
properties.description: 图片保存的绝对路径

properties.name: com.www.common.file.other-url-path
properties.description: 图片外其他文件访问路径

properties.name: com.www.common.file.other-save-path
properties.description: 图片外其他文件保存的绝对路径

properties.name: com.www.common.mybatis.limit
properties.description: 是否开启全局结果集数量限制

properties.name: com.www.common.mybatis.database
properties.description: 数据库类型，不区分大小写

properties.name: com.www.common.mybatis.limit-num
properties.description: 结果集限制数量

properties.name: com.www.common.oauth2.enable
properties.description: 是否开启oauth2资源方认证配置

properties.name: com.www.common.oauth2.signing-key
properties.description: jwt令牌签名

properties.name: com.www.common.securuty.enable
properties.description: 是否开启Security认证

properties.name: com.www.common.securuty.secret-key
properties.description: jwt令牌签名

properties.name: com.www.common.securuty.expire-time-second
properties.description: 过期时间（秒）

properties.name: com.www.common.securuty.cookie-day
properties.description: cookie免登录有效天数

properties.name: com.www.common.securuty.user-prefix
properties.description: 使用redis保存用户的token的key前缀
